(Program 
  (Statement 
    (Arg 
      (Primary 
        (Integer "1234")))) 
  (Statement 
    (Arg 
      (Primary 
        (Integer "1_234")))) 
  (Statement 
    (Arg 
      (Primary 
        (Integer "0d1_234")))) 
  (Statement 
    (Arg 
      (Primary 
        (Integer "0xa_bcd_ef0_123_456_789")))) 
  (Statement 
    (Arg 
      (Primary 
        (Integer "0o1234567")))) 
  (Statement 
    (Arg 
      (Primary 
        (Integer "0b1_0")))) 
  (Statement 
    (Arg 
      (Primary 
        (Float "1.234_5e678_90")))))
